attributes.action: Stop government agencies sharing personal data
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government Agencies sharing data - is in total breach of the human rights act.

ANPR is pretty much a total invasion of privacy as far as the human rights act goes, the DVLA database is so messed up it is unreal.
ID cards are the same invasion of privacy - My petitiion is to stop government agencies sharing personal details.
